commit message: Don't crash with tile size 1; don't bother trying to fit in 10 pixels.
Don't clear state by default after a crash.
Workaround 'View not attached to window manager'
Say why the saved game couldn't be reported.
Enable stylus-based mode, e.g. rotational UI in Net.
Don't mention trackball; some don't have one and the rest will work it out.
Stay in cursor mode, like Solo.
Disable grid view on tablets; tweak grid spacing.
Use a RelativeLayout (shorter hierarchy, yay!); show keyboard in GUI editor.
Use RelativeLayout in two more places.
Crash handler: clear state later; finish on launching Market.
Don't *always* show at least 3 action items; that would break ICS.
